House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted elimination of child's insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act for postsecondary school students.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981 which eliminate, after July 1982, child's insurance benefits under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act for postsecondary school students aged 18 to 22.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted elimination of child's insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act for postsecondary school students.
